metadata.feature_description: Share posts on social media platforms and generate RSS feeds

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Publisher module with share buttons should be visible
steps.actual: Publisher module displayed with share buttons (Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest visible, Twitter initially hidden)

steps.expected: Settings panel should show Enable sharing checkboxes
steps.actual: Settings panel opened with 5 checkboxes for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS

steps.expected: Twitter share button should appear after enabling
steps.actual: Twitter share button appeared in the social share section after enabling the checkbox

steps.expected: Facebook share popup should open with the post URL
steps.actual: Facebook share popup opened at https://www.facebook.com/share.php with the current page URL as parameter

steps.expected: LinkedIn share popup should open with the post URL
steps.actual: LinkedIn share popup opened at https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle with mini=true, url, and title parameters

steps.expected: Pinterest share popup should open with the post URL
steps.actual: Pinterest share popup opened at https://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/ with url, description, and media parameters

steps.expected: Twitter share popup should open with the post URL
steps.actual: Twitter/X share popup opened at https://x.com (redirected from twitter.com/home) with status parameter containing the URL

steps.action: Enable RSS checkbox in Publisher Settings
steps.expected: RSS icon should appear in share buttons section
steps.actual: RSS checkbox enabled and RSS icon appeared in the social share section

steps.expected: RSS feed XML should be generated with published posts
steps.actual: Valid RSS 2.0 XML feed generated with channel info (link, language) and 2 items containing title, author, description, link, and pubDate

steps.expected: Post detail page should show 'Share this post:' label with share buttons
steps.actual: Post detail page displayed with 'Share this post:' label and all 5 share buttons (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, RSS)

steps.expected: Post should display title, date, description, and author information
steps.actual: Post displayed correctly with title 'Workflow Test Post - Claude Testing', date 'January 9, 2026', description text, and author 'SuperUser Account' with 'More from this author' link

observations: Copy post link to clipboard: No UI element found for this feature. The code (SocialShareManager.js) only implements share functions for Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Pinterest - no clipboard copy functionality exists.
Share count tracking: The ShareController.cs logs user activity for gamification scoring but there is no visible share count display in the UI to test.
Twitter setting was disabled by default while Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pinterest were enabled by default.
RSS was disabled by default as per ShareSettingsManager.cs (RssEnabled defaults to false).
The social share buttons use popup windows with specific dimensions for each platform (Facebook: 600x225, Twitter: 600x400, LinkedIn: 1024x400, Pinterest: 600x400).
